name: pakku：哔哩哔哩弹幕过滤器
description: 在B站(bilibili.com)看视频时，经常烦恼于低质量的弹幕刷屏？现在只需一键，即可合并那些刷屏的相似弹幕。
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://*.cnzz.com; frame-src http://s.xmcp.ml; img-src data: http://s.xmcp.ml https://*.cnzz.com; object-src 'self'; connect-src http://s.xmcp.ml http://comment.bilibili.com https://comment.bilibili.com https://img.shields.io; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'
